name: Too Deep
description:
Submission for the Game Dev TV 2021 Game Jam.

Urist the dwarf's greed may get the best of him as he struggles to collect gold and escape from the Hellspawn he unleashed deep beneath the mountain.

ControlsKeyboardControllerStartAnyStartMoveA/D or Left/Right Arrow
Left Stick or Dpad Left/Right
JumpSpace or X
A
DashShiftB or Right Trigger
Slide/PogoS or Down Arrow
Left Stick or Dpad DownDrop
through platform
S or Down Arrow
+ Space or X
Left Stick or Dpad Down
+ A
Discard Coin
QXRestart Level
RSelect
